report.title: Dive groups for date
report.description: Gets the list of known dive groups for a given date.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id AND su.deleted=false JOIN sample_attribute_values sav on sav.sample_id=s.id and sav.sample_attribute_id=#group_attr_id# and sav.deleted=false #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: date
param.description: Date of the dive to filter against

param.name: group_attr_id
param.description: Sample attribute ID for the dive group or survey
